title: Online Team-Based Science Project Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in scientific fields and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for current professionals focusing on enhancing team collaboration skills to solve real-world workplace problems, structured with asynchronous LMS-based learning and project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively with team members using online collaboration tools.
Learners can plan and execute team projects to solve practical problems in scientific fields.
Learners can submit weekly project deliverables and provide feedback using collaboration features within the LMS.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
